VVB Assessment The monitoring parameter, Unit, and descriptions are as per the registered VCS-PD /05/. Data / Parameter CAPpy Data unit W Description Installed capacity of the hydro power plant after the implementation of the project activity Source of data Project site The source of data is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/. Description of measurement methods and procedures to be applied Determine the installed capacity based on manufacturerâ€™s specifications or commissioning data or recognized standards The measurement method is_ in accordance with the registered VCS- PD /05/. Frequency of monitoring/recording Once at the beginning of each crediting period The frequency of monitoring/recording is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/. Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

Purpose of the data Calculation of project emissions The purpose of the monitoring parameter is to calculate the project emission which is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/. Calculation method Comments This parameter is used to calculate the power density. The purpose of the monitoring parameter is to calculate the power density (ultimately project emission) which is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/.
